comments:
Build 20020404

I keep getting the following NPE when I try to add overwrite a project in my
workspace with the project in the repository. I select the project in the
repository view and choose "Check out as project." I'm prompted that the project
already exists and I choose to overwrite. An internal error dialog pops up and
the following appears in my log.

Log: Fri Apr 05 14:54:05 CST 2002
4 org.eclipse.team.ui 1 Internal error occured.

It turns out that the project in question seems to have lost its Java nature in
my workspace (arg). The problem could be related to the fact that I'm
overwriting a simple project with a Java project.

Continuing fun...

I deleted the project in the Navigator and brought it in from the repository
again. It showed up as a simple project again, so I decided to have a look at
the properties, where I discovered the "capabilities" page. I tried to add
"Java" which appeared to work. The project now shows up in the packages view.
However, it has now lost its CVS information! I can't synch with the repository
on this project that I just checked out of the repository.
*** Bug 12907 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Did you try a Team/Share Project to see if it would add the cvs nature back?
